## MA STEM Education Quantitative methods in educational research - student projects

This is a page to show student work from the MA STEM Quantitative Methods in Educational Research Module





## Example code


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Create a UK subset
PISAUK<-PISA_2018%>%
  filter(CNT=="United Kingdom")%>%
  select(PV1SCIE, PV1MATH)
# Plot scores, but add them to bins to reduce over ploting
# Set a colour scale to show number in bins
ggplot(PISAUK, aes(x=PV1MATH, y=PV1SCIE))+
  stat_bin2d(bins = 90) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "lightblue", high = "red", limits = c(0, 80))+
  ggtitle("UK PISA Science and Mathematics scores")+
  labs(x="Mathematics score", y="Science Score")
```
